Title: The House
Actors: Will Ferrell, Amy Poehler, Jason Mantzoukas, Ryan Simpkins
Plot: After the town scholarship program no longer has funding, two parents are left without money to send their daughter to university. Left without any other options, they along with a friend, start an illegal casino in his home to make cash before the summer ends.
Production: Good Universe, New Line Cinema, Gary Sanchez Productions, Village Roadshow Pictures
